1.content:
You were one of the fifty Colonist chosen to inhabit one of five planets each one of these planet's was in a different solar system making it difficult for you to choose fortunately you were able to and for the last year you have been preparing for this planet. Automated drones explored a bit of these planets to determine various factors that may be known or unknown. Including to determine if there were any natives on the planet or what you would know as alien life forms. The drones searched for water, and food sources. When they came back they had five different planets that you could choose from.

The first of which was a planet that was named by your people as "Crimson Gaia". This planet was the largest of the five to be found. The planet according to the drone reports had told you that it had ten continents on it. However only one of them was fully explored by the drones, oddly enough it was the only drone to come back. Crimson Gaia was also described to have many plants and wildlife with various shades of red. Gravity upon this planets was five times greater than that of earth, as well as the planet itself being five times bigger. As far as any signs of alien life forms or natives. It had been conclude undetermined.

The second planet the drones have reported however was quite different from the previous planet and was only three times bigger than the earth. this planet also had three times the gravity of the planet. The planet's wildlife on this planet were not red, but instead purple. This planet was known to have actually less continents than earth but however they were much bigger all four of them. There were also signs of alien or native life, but none were seen by the drones. The drones weather conditions report that living on this planet would be especially hard during the winter season, fortunately there were several thermal induced caves people could live in during that period.

The Third planet was the most earth like and was given the name Second Earth. Like it's name suggest this was the most earth like of the planets and it even had a similar gravity and number of continents. While the number of continents were the same there shape was different. This planet has the highest chance of meeting alien or native life forms.

The fourth planet was slightly smaller than that of earth, and had slightly less gravity, but not much to make much of a difference. It had three large continents and was much more bluish than that of our earth. The three continents did indeed seem to connect to each other. However the rest of the planet as the drones had described this one was a Tropical paradise. Since all the continents were close to the equator of this planet making it quite warm and pleasant. This planet however showed no signs of native life forms at all. However it would be a paradise for people to live in as long as your not the type that likes large exploration's that is.

The final and fifth planet to choose from was the smallest and lightest gravity of all the planet's. This planet only had zero continent's instead it had many various islands, some larger and some smaller but none bigger. Similar to the previous planet however was that the weather here was also tropical, at least in some islands. Other islands had different types of weather. In fact the weather seemed quite unstable at times. Fortunately though it was nothing to severe.

After you viewed all five option you finally knew which planet you were going to pick as the one that you decided to live out the rest of your life on. For that reason you decided to choose the....
1.title: The Five Planets

choices: 25 year old male, the oldest colonist on the trip
11.content:
You decided to choose the Red Earth the largest and strongest of the gravities of all the planet's. You're reasons for doing so were you felt like you needed a planet that could really challenge you and this was the one that would really challenge you. As you boarded the shuttle you saw the other people that had chosen this planet as well. They seemed about excited about it as you were. The trip to arrive in the planet would take a year. However during that year you would get to know your fellow Colonist.

You noticed form each colonist going to this planet that five of them were male, and the remaining five were female. Which would give you plenty of time to get to know the other nine colonist with you. The second thing you noticed is they all seemed to vary in age. As for yourself however you are...
11.title: The Red Earth

112.content:
You yourself are a twenty four year old female who has been well educated. Each of the Colonist that with you were of various age. Despite that even the youngest of the colonist who were with you on the trip were valuable as you recognized both of them as child prodigies.

The plane was as red as Mars, but unlike Mars it had shown signs of life. The trees and grass had various shade of red with them as well as the bark of the trees themselves being orange rather than the light brown and green that you were used to on Earth. The wind and the air was fresh and the continents were quite large meaning that there would be quite a bit of exploration.

Since there would be a lot of exploration however it means that while the first few night's many of the colonist would get to know each other. The rest of the days you all would be too far from each other to do so. The transport landing area was pretty much inside the one continent that the drone's had picked when they searched for signs of life. However you remember that only one of the drone's came back, despite them sending at least ten on the planet., which meant something happened to the other drone's and none of you had any idea where they could be. This is a rather large planet full of life after all.

All the Colonist gather and wave at the transport as it leaves the planet. Leaving the ten of you with only your wits and limited equipment to explore the planet. Thankfully some of that included hover cycles. Hover cycles were one of the few vehicles on your world developed years ago that were still pollution free. It came at a time when the people on earth still cared about their planet. As they began to search more and more for other planet's to live on however, it seemed that Earth got even lazier in caring for their own planet. None of the colonist wanted that when they were chosen to inhabit this planet. The colonist instead picked environment friendly vehicles that would aid in there exploration.

Now that all of that is out of the way the meeting can begin. " Listen up, there's a lot to explore and we might not get to know each other so allow me to introduce myself. My name is Greg and I come from Earth. For the first few weeks we should take a look at our guidebooks as it has all the drone's reporting and tells us what we can eat and can not." Greg told us, it was good advice even though we brought food from home we all knew that there was expected to be another transport in six months with more food. However it would be best not to rely on it for there are a number of things that could happen that could change that fact.

Everyone was eager to explore, however for the first few days we would be getting to know each other and learning each others Specialty for each one of the colonist had a different field of study with. As far as yourself goes your expertise was in..
112.title: An Intelligent Female

choices: Ran away you were too nervous....
An obnoxious guy ran into you
Fell into a rather large footprint?!
113.content:
You are a sixteen year old male with an incredibly adventurous spirit. You knew this planet would be the right pick for you as there were many places to explore and discover, and you like the challenge of a heavier gravity. You looked around and saw that the oldest of the Colonist arriving upon this planet. Out of the ten that chose this planet the oldest person was around twenty six years of age. Fortunately you weren't the youngest as there were two nine years of age one a boy and the other a girl who also came. You ship had finally landed and you all had finished your training to get used to the new gravity.

The training to deal with this type of gravity came quite handy and helped all of you each a bit. During the trip you managed to get to know your fellow Colonists. The first of which was a twenty five year old man, who went by the name of Christopher. Christopher had brown hair, blue eyes and was about six feet even. His build was even more impressive as he was also quite strong. Christopher also knew several types of martial arts. As soon as you got off the ship he immediately took charge, and not a single person dared to ignore him. It became obvious to you that he would be the leader of the colonists.

The second oldest was a woman who was twenty four years old. She had red hair, blue eyes and her height was about five feet and six inches tall. The most noticeable thing you noticed about her however was that she had a ring on her finger and often hanged out a lot witch Chris. Her Name was Sarah and she had claimed to be Christopher's wife even though they have yet to be married. Despite both of them acting like it.

The two youngest of the colonist were the two nine years old you noticed earlier. They're names were James and Jennifer. As it turned out these two happened to be close friends. They also mentioned that they both have siblings who were also on this planet as well.

The next person was at least to your mind the most beautiful woman you had ever seen, you felt like you had to talk to her, she was about your age had blond hair, blue eyes. You were wanting to talk to her, but you felt pressure in your heart as if kept beating and beating. The beating of your heart got faster and faster. You had began to approach her.....
113.title: An Adventurous Teen!

1133.content:
Just as you had began to approach the woman you wanted to introduce yourself to you fell into a rather large footprint. Thankfully you weren't hurt but you saw that the foot print was rather large in fact. Larger than any footprint you had seen before and you haven't exactly seen that many. Fortunately the woman around your age that you were trying to reach came to you as you began to get up after falling into the footprint. " Are you alright?" She asked.

" Yes, I am fine just fell into a footprint." You said. Realizing what you said you looked carefully at the foot print and realized that whatever made it was quite big. Then again everything on this planet was big to you and the other Colonist. Upon further examination of the footprint you began to realize that this footprint didn't look like it belonged to an animal. Mainly due to the fact that the footprint was a humanoid shape.

" The footprint appears to be humanoid shape and heading west of hear, if I had to say this might be one of the signs of intelligent life we've been looking for." The woman said.

" Um.. What is your name?' You gather your courage to say as the woman is completely entranced by the footprint.

" Sheila is my name. Judging by this footprint the humanoid who made it had to be at least thirty feet tall, but that would be impossible on our planet. " Sheila said, while still focusing on the footprint. It was just one footprint but she suspected that there might be more further West as that was the direction the footprint was indicating.

" Hey, want to go further and west and see if we can find what made this footprint?" Sheila asked me. She had obviously made up her mind to go West even if you decided not to. However if you went back to the temporary base you could grab a vehicle and get there faster than you would have on foot. On the other had if you really didn't know if the humanoid making this footprint was friendly or not so it might just be best to wait at the base and hope for the best. It was the safest option you had. Eventually after thinking on it a bit you decided too...
1133.title: Mysterious Footprint!

115.content:
I look around and eager to explore but I know I am not allowed to just yet. I am wearing the following jeans, t shirt, sock, boots, bra, and panties. My name is Cassie. I just turned twelve two days ago. I am still not sure whom I will be staying with. On the ship I had my own room. Here I know I will be forced to stay with someone even though I rather have my own place. I have my bag with all my stuff in it.

I am still looking around when the Captain of the ship walks up to me. He tells me I am to wait with another female that is few years older than me. I saw the older girl on the ship but never had the chance to talk to her.

I later find out i will be staying with
115.title: The Youngest.

choices: Meet up with the other Eight
1151.content:
I later find out I would be staying with the Older Girl. I don't know who she is, or even what she is like. But the Captain comes up to me and then ensures me. " Don't worry Cassie, the girl you are staying with I believe you two will be get along just fine.

" Why do I have to stay with someone? Can't I just stay on my own?" I asked. The Captain fortunately was quick to respond and answer my question thoroughly.

" There are only a total of ten people who would be staying here, one of them is you. A lot of room went into various supplies and the ship so we could only carry so much at this time. As far as the ship goes, if everything on the home planet goes well a supply ship for more homes should be available in another six months."

With his explanation the others who would be staying on the same planet had also arrived and stepped on to the planet. While that was happening I was meeting with the woman who I would be staying with. Her age was only a few years from mine, but the moment I came into her view she went and smiled at me.

" You are Cassie? Correct Nice to meet you! My name is Amber, I know it's rough but I'll be your roommate for while you are staying her okay?" Amber asked me.

Amber was nice enough for now and despite that was also eager to get to the planet just as I was. The two of us were the last to leave the ship. As far as the Captain went he came and went back to earth. During our trip we had training to deal with the heavy gravity, I can't imagine how thankful I am for that training now. Getting off the ship and on to the planet we saw it for the first time. I know the planet was named Crimson Gaia, but this was the first time I was able to see why. The leaves and grass were red, not a deep red but an occasionally light red with various shades of pink blending in. The planet looked quite beautiful and the climate was quite warm, if not a bit dusty from time to time.

The first thing me and Amber did is....
1151.title: The Older Girl

choices: a meeting is about to start
11511.content:
We set up our home. Thank goodness for technology. Our home is built with thirty minutes. It takes a little longer to bring in our furniture and supplies. We both exhausted but we still need to hook up the power and water. Lucky for us the engineer from the ship does it for us. We take a break and eat some for food.

After we eat I unpack my stuff. I don't have much. Its mostly clothes and few books to read. I am glad I got my own bedroom and bathroom. I go back to the main room. In the main room is a sitting area and kitchen. I tell Amber I like my privacy. She tells me she is the same way.

We go out to find
11511.title: Set-Up home

115111.content:
We go out to find a meeting is about to start. It looks like we got our home set up just in time. I look at Amber and see that she has red hair, blue eyes she's slightly taller than me but only about an inch of two. Her outfit however was much different than what I was wearing though. I am not sure why I didn't notice it sooner, but Amber is wearing a white lab coat and black pants. along with sneakers for shoe's I am confident the reason she wore sneaker's was more for comfort than to look pretty.

" What kind of job did you when you were on Earth?" I asked curiously now that I was paying more attention to her attire.

" I am a biologist, I study life." Amber quickly replied.

Learning Amber was a biologist was interesting to me. As far as myself goes I had studied life before in my limited age group, but mostly just for school. I hated school on Earth it was such a pain and never much fun. There were always test and more tests. The problem was that they tested us with everything giving us very little time to ourselves or even asking us what we wanted to do. Instead we just got tested for every little thing, It was rather annoying and I am glad I don't have to go to school here.

We go to the gathering and listen as the other fellow colonists speak. I look and examine each and every one of them. One was a guy with blond hair, blue eyes, and very tall and muscular. I haven't hear his name yet but from the look of his uniform he was in the Military. The second one I notice was also wearing a military uniform, however her uniform was quite different from the guys. She could have been in a different Military altogether for all I know. Either way both of them looked real intense sitting next to each other and I wasn't going to have any of that so I decided to sit next to the two other girls.

The girls didn't bother me as much and one of the was almost old as Amber, and the other was almost as young as me. Apparently they got paired to sleep with each other as well. I go over and introduce myself to the two girls I am sitting next to. I didn't want to be rude to people I do not know.

The girl that was sitting to me on my right she was the closest of my age. When I introduced myself she told me her name was Sequoya. It was a real pretty name but kind of hard to pronounce, she even told me about how her ancestors were natives to America. Her tanned skin and black hair certainly made her look the part. If Sequoya's story is true than I can't imagine how hard it must have been for her to leave everything she knew behind. On the other hand all of us are in the same boat. Mainly because we all left everything we knew behind as well. It might not be much of a problem for others though.

As for the girl sitting to me on my left when I introduced myself she was the one who annoyed me the most. For some reason she always treats me like a child. I am not a child anymore and I can handle myself, but this girl she doesn't seem to listen every time I explain it to her. Her name is Mina, I don't know much about her though. So far she and the Military girl are the only people I seem to have a problem with. Amber, Sequoya, The Military girl and Mina as well as myself are the only girl's on this planet. Well as far as we know that is, there could be more but there's a lot to search for on this planet before finding any signs of native life.

Knowing almost half of the Colonist we being to proceed with the meeting. The meeting is led by the Military girl who called herself Sergeant Bask. She quickly pretty much told us the basics of why we are here. We knew much of that stuff already and then suggested that we get to know each and every one of the people here. She insists that it's because we will have to depend on each other for survival. After hearing her words I decided to...
115111.title: a meeting is about to start

1151111.content:
After hear her words I decided to meet the remaining colonist all of which who were guys. At least then I could finally get some privacy and maybe there would be a time when I would eventually need them for something. As far as Myself goes however I wouldn't necessarily need to though.

I approach the remaining five colonist and carefully examine each and ever one of them. The oldest of the group had a muscular build, brown hair and was at least six feet and five inches tall. He wore a casual white shirt, and jeans with sneakers. His hands looked quite big. He most likely was into fixing and building machine's if I had to guess. The second guy next to him was a bit different he was shorter in stature, but still around six feet tall. He wore a white lab coat, and white sacks. Must be hard on him all that white he is wearing really made him stand out. I suspected that he was a doctor of some kind. I didn't know what kind of doctor he was, however if I have a health issue he'd probably the one to go to.

The next of the remaining colonist was closer to my age but still younger than me. Much to my surprise he was the guy in the military uniform I have seen before. He was still very tall and muscular, perhaps even taller than the other guy. He still intimidates me though even now. I even question why they continue to wear the military uniform even though they aren't part of the military any more since they live on this planet. I may be young but there is something off about that guy.

The next two of the Colonist were the youngest of the bunch. They were also the closest to my age, so I figured they would be the one's I would introduce myself to.

" Hello my name is Cassie. who are you?" I asked. Apparently one of them was very shy and was quick to run away from me as soon as I introduced myself to him. At least that's what I thought for all I know he could have had some weird crush on me. As far as the one that remained he did indeed introduce himself and like me he was the youngest of the group but only older than me by a year.

" Hi Cassie, My name is Sean. Sorry about Thomas, I know he ran away when you introduced yourself but don't hold it against him okay?" Sean asked.

" Okay I wont, I am just trying to get something over with so we can get on with what's real important anyways." I told Sean.

" Eager to explore the Planet then?" Sean asks me.

" Quite, and so far all we have done is get to know each other a bit, I could use a bit of exploration." I told Sean.

" Then perhaps I can help, I have been looking at some of the drone's report and I think I know where we can find some truly interesting discoveries." Sean told me. I was intrigued by his response but wasn't sure what the interesting discoveries were or how it would affect us, however exploration of this planet is one of the biggest reasons I cam here after all.

" Where are these so called discoveries?" I asked. Sean look at me and then smiled as he began his response to my question.

" There's one west a couple of miles away from the camp, and another South of us but to get to that one we would have to travel on the hover cycles provided for us. Otherwise it would take too long." Sean said.

I now had two destinations to pick out one that was West it was walking distance so we could be there and back before nightfall. On the other hand there was also another discovery south of here as well, at least according to what he saw from the drone reports. Neither of us knew what possibility would be there though. On the downside we would definitely be noticed if we went that far alone and the people who are older than us would no doubt not let the two of us go alone to this place. I wasn't sure which way to go but eventually I decided to go...
1151111.title: The remaining Colonists

choices: we fall into a hole we see to late
11511111.content:
Wanting to go alone but knowing for now that isn't allowed I decide to go with Sean. We tell the person in charge where we are going. We each take a survival pack. Sean and I head out. As we leaving we see several other groups heading out.

Sean and I take our time scouting the area. We do talk and get to know each other better. It turns we both have a lot in common. We do have our differences though. We come across a small creek. We take take a water sample and put in Sean's bag. I also take a few samples of plant life. The plan is we going to take the samples back to our base camp for other people to examine them. We start hiking again. We come up huge hillside. We climb to the top of it. The view from the top is amazing. We take several pictures.

As we start to go down the other side we
11511111.title: West the shorter route.

115111111.content:
As we start to go down the other side we trip and fall onto something that at the time we weren't exactly sure what we had fell onto, but thankfully we were prepared for what is out there and manage to prevent ourselves from falling off the huge hillside. As we both go and get up we managed to find something we hadn't noticed yet. It was a pathway and it was quite big. We could tell it's a pathway because despite the tree's being around it there were no branches on the path and it looked like there was some kind of maintenance done towards this path.

" Wow! I didn't expect this." Sean said as he looked at the pathway in amazement. We both knew what finding this path meant though. It was the one of the first signs of intelligent life on the planet. However I have yet to meet any other than a bit of the wildlife. As expected of this planet however, just like everything else it was five time's bigger than you expected. I got excited about this prospect of continue to explore until I found more signs of intelligent life. Unfortunately I also knew that for now it would probably be best to report this back to the base camp where your home with Amber is. For all we know the population could either be extinct or rather dangerous to us. We both discuss it and decide that our best option at least for now is....
115111111.title: Accidental Discovery

choices: Sergeant Bask and The Military guy both terribly wounded!
Sequoya and another guy who went to map the area.
Mina and another guy who appeared to be poisoned!
1151111111.content:
We both decided that rather than continue we'd report our findings back at base. After all we didn't want to traverse too far ahead without a thought or a plan. After a few hours of walking back it didn't take long but eventually we reached back towards the camp where Amber was waiting. She was perhaps the only who didn't really go out into the field and explore that much. As there was plenty of vegetation around the base for her to examine and most of the ones who went further than that were looking for more than just vegetation. From what we understood one group went out to observe wildlife in the area. Another just went out to map the region, they packed a rather big supply and headed for the closest yet highest grounds they could find. As for the rest they just stayed here and mostly cooked.

" Hello Amber, We came back we find some thing you might be interested in as well as a few things other people might be interested in as well." I told Amber as we handed over the water sample and the various vegetation.

" Thank you, this should help me quite a bit. Would you like to hear about what I learned so far Cassie?" Amber asked me.

" Sure, I think we have time." I replied.

With that Amber shared about what she had learned from being on this planet so far. " I am sure you are quite aware of the various shades of red on this planet. Well that includes many plants except a few exceptions but depending on the color can determine what the plant is capable of. So far most plants brought back to me were various shades of red except for this one." Amber then showed us a plant that wasn't actually red on the planet but instead was rather green. In fact it looked like a regular plant that you could find on Earth.

" Is this plant from earth?" I asked.

Amber shakes her head. " No It isn't, but you should be cautious of plants that aren't shades of red as they are the ones that have the possibility of being poisonous. I wouldn't recommend eating anything on the planet at least until we find out what is edible. Fortunately we have our food supply from the ship, but that will only last about a year." After discussing the plant life with Amber we had to wait for some of the other groups to come back to tell about the path that we had seen. It took a few hours but eventually a group came back it was...
1151111111.title: Back to the Base

choices: An Electrical Storm Destroys our equipment!
Wild Animals pillaging all our food!
11511111111.content:
Sergeant Bask and the other Military guy who appeared to be terribly wounded. Fortunately they were still alive, although it would seem the two at the time did not want to talk about what happened. For awhile we just stared until finally I couldn't take it any more and decided to speak.

" What happened to you two? You look terrible." I asked.


" We went hunting and found it harder to be expected." The Military guy said. At least they were both still alive and the thought of a civilization is still in my mind. However now both those two would have to rest and heal before we can do anything else on the planet. Which means investigations of life and other stuff would now be halted. I was disappointed but glad that they were at least safe.

I went and looked to examine their equipment and tools for t heir hunting trip. But was shocked to learn that this equipment was made from the strongest material found on earth and yet it couldn't even damage a life form that they were hunting. I wanted to know more about this planet but from the way their equipment was damaged, I knew we would have to adapt to this planet more quickly than we had anticipated. I hoped that this would be the last of the incident but for now we chose to stay together.

As the ten of us came back together we watched as the sun began to fade into the night. I returned to my room along with my room mate Amber. Unfortunately I had yet to find out that this planet had just begun to test us. Mostly because the next day brought...
11511111111.title: Wounds of the Hunt

choices: You Help Amber with her projects
115111111111.content:
Brought about a Storm that none of us had yet to see. As the storm and the water raged on, ordinarily a storm wouldn't stop us. However the storm was fierce with it's lightning and thunder, not only that but the harsh winds made it almost impossible to go outside that day. We knew there was weather but at this point we didn't know exactly how fierce it could be.


Fortunately we would make it out of the storm all alive. Our equipment however was another story as all our high tech gadgets and machinery for investigating the planet was completely and utterly devastated by the storm. Which meant we couldn't rely on it too much. Thankfully our houses still worked and were functional. The only thing the storm did was knock out all the electricity. After the storm was passed the Captain told us that it would take a couple of days before any of our equipment would be in working order again. But when they finally get it back, they will adjust it to make sure something like this doesn't happen again.

Hopefully the next day would be a better day than today. It does leave me wondering what will happen on the next day?
115111111111.title: Another Bad Day

choices: Four of the Colonist are you Family members!
All of the colonist were your Neighbors?!
Not one of the Colonist were above the age of thirteen!
12.content: You didn't want to over exert yourself with the heavy gravity of the first planet, however still felt you needed a challenge and decided to go with the second planet. While many adventures would have to wait for you to arrive on the planet you began to notice something unique about the other people who had chosen to go to this planet with you. You weren't sure what it was, but you quickly found out that...
12.title: A Planet of Purple

choices: Little Princess( You are a girl)
Little man ( You are a guy)
121.content:
Much to your surprise you found out that four of the Colonist were you family members. You were quite surprised at that. This wasn't a disappointing surprise however, you were glad that four of the people were your family members. One of them you recognized as your older brother Hank, he was a very nice guy and quite strong as well. Being your older brother you occasionally felt you always had to live up to be a greater person than Hank already is. Thankfully however he was quite understanding of your situation.

The next person was your little sister who was about one year younger than you. Despite that you knew your sister Amanda was quite perceptive and constantly analyzing just about everything she could. To you she was the smartest member of your family.

The final two you recognized were the oldest of the bunch, as it turns out they were your parents. It was quite a big surprise to see both your mother, father, brother and sister all on the same planet together. Fortunately as you looked as the other five colonist it would appear they too were in the exact same position. In other words there were ten people on this planet, but two different families.

Of course this lead you to ask the questions about how they got here. Apparently that fact was fairly obvious. They chose it. Now you don't have to worry about being separated from your family. As for yourself however you were the middle child of the three kids your parents had. When you were little your parents always called you their...
121.title: Your Family is WIth you!

choices: Try and get Everyone to Work together
Meet the Girls of the other family
1212.content:
They had always called you their Little man, a name that you hated and detested when growing up. Fortunately for yourself however you have grown quite a bit from those days and you and most of your siblings are all adults now. Except for your little sister who had just turned fourteen. You didn't know much about the other family other than that, the five seem to be the complete opposite of your family. As they did have their mother and father, two sisters and a brother.

You decided to go and introduce yourself to the other family. " Hello, guess we will be working together to survive on this planet, Right?" You asked.

The father of the other family however scoffed at the notion of your suggestion. " Working Together? With them? Ha! I'd rather be eaten then work with your family!" The Other families father replied. It wasn't long before your mother heard his response that she went and came over to you and him.

" You don't have the right to talk to my son that way! All he suggested is that we work together. I don't see that being so hard Thomas." Your mother said. It was at this point you realized that your mother had knew the father of the other family. This peaked your curiosity as you often wondered why your family and his didn't get along.

" Mom, How do you two know each other?" You asked.

" Of Course we do, Back on Earth we used to work together, but our views our rather different." You mom said.

" Different is one way of putting it. It is apparently obvious though that you have told your son the whole story though. He doesn't even know your secret let alone mine." Thomas said as he went off and walked away from you and your mom.

" What is this secret he's talking about mom?" You asked your mother.

" It's because I believe in Magic, Well that is part of it. Thomas however believes deeply in Science so much so that occasionally he can be blinded by his ambition. I never told you about it because there was never a need for it." Your mother explained. Although you were satisfied with the response you couldn't help but think that there was more to it than she told. After all to you it seemed kind of silly that the only thing causing the father of the other family disliking you was because of your mother's belief in magic. You gave it some thought and eventually decided too...
1212.title: Two Families, Too Different Views

123.content:
None of the Colonist that had chosen this planet were above the age of thirteen, and that was including yourself. You could tell that depending on how things work out. This could become a paradise or a nightmare. It all depends on the various people and how their behavior would affect the group and community as a whole. You didn't recognize any of them.

Which meant none of the Colonist were friends with you, at least not yet. This meant that you and the other nine colonist would have to learn to live and get along with each other. Despite not yet having to know anything about the others. You weren't exactly sure where to start. Including yourself there were Five boys and five girls. four of which were no younger than ten. Only two people were at least thirteen years of age though.

You also suspected that during sometime during the trip some of the colonists that are young may start to miss their parent and start to cry. This was no doubt something you were indeed expecting to happen. However you also knew that the ten of you only had each other to depend on now.

Taking a look at the planet you see it's many beauties and wonders for the first time. You even catch the attention of some wildlife who are understandably cautious about you. There were many things you wanted to do and felt like you had to do, but first you had to....
123.title: A group of Teens and Children?!

1233.content:
You had to gather everyone together and group them. This group of Colonist may only be a group of children and Teens but you were not going to let this group fall apart. As far as you knew you didn't even know how your colonist group got to this but first you had to get everyone in a single spot. Which took you a lot longer than you expected but eventually everyone was finally gathered and paying attention to you.

" I know this is a bit odd, There aren't any parents here to comfort us when we are alone. But together we are a community and we will make our own rules." The colonist had cheered that statement you had said. What you said however was true. Without out any parents it would be up to the remaining to make the rules. You also had noticed that the transport that left the ten of you here was already gone. Almost as if the people of your own world thought the rest of you were unimportant to them. In some ways it kind of felt like you were abandoned by your own world.

" All though we can make our own rules, none of us wants to suffer, so please don't do anything to make other's suffer." You told them. They weren't as interested in that speech as they were your first words which got everyones attention. " For now though let's introduce ourselves to each other, I am sure many of you don't know each other so we should at least get each other's name first. We will go from youngest to oldest." The fist to stand and introduce himself was a boy.

"Hi, My name is Max and I am ten years old." Max said to the group. He was definitely one of the four of the youngest ones that you saw earlier. He was wearing a blue shirt and blue jeans with white socks and sneakers. His clothes were very plain for a ten year old. At least when compared to you at that age.

After Max introduced himself, a girl stood up and began to introduce herself. " Hello you can call me Mary I am also ten years old. I am also what the adults would call a child genius cause I could solve equations those idiots could not." Mary said confidently as she began to sit back down. She was also one of the youngest in the group you saw, she wore a slim pair of glasses, her hair was brown and was in a French braid. From what you could tell from her response she was very intelligent and often considered herself to be better than her elders who weren't as smart as her. Resulting in a somewhat bratty attitude. She wore a pink dress with white socks and Mary Jane's she even wore pink gloves as well.

" My name is Peter I am also ten but unlike the other's I am the coolest ten year old around." The third of the youngest group introduced himself. He was quite confident that he was the coolest person around and even wore shades to prove it. His attitude of thinking he was cool was a bit annoying to you, but for now you tolerated it. He was after all only ten. His leather jacket and black shirt with his blue jeans, white socks and flip flops made up the entirety of what he wore. The next person to introduce herself was the last of the four that were the youngest in your group of Colonist.

" Hi, My name is Kiki, I am not very talkative but when I have something to say it's usually important, I am also ten years old and I have never had any parents all my life. So I am what you call an orphan but I hope we can get along." Kiki said as she introduced herself. So far two boys and two girls had introduced themselves but Kiki out of the four seemed to be the humblest and honest out of the four.

" That was a fine introduction Kiki. My name is Hans and I've been a friend of Kiki's for a long time. But anyone who even dares to try and hurt her will have to go through me. My parents name me Hans because they liked those ancient Star Wars movies, least until they abandoned me when I was four. I have been Kiki's friend ever since I am eleven years old." Hans told us. You were quickly learning that each of these people had their own problems on Earth some of which were quite saddening to you. As you weren't one with that problem you had a family of your own after all.

" Hello to you all. I am about eleven years old as well. You can call me Betty I don't have much to say like the other's as my life is now here, not on Earth." Betty said. As soon as she introduced herself her words affected the people who were saddened by Kiki's story and cheered them right up. It was almost like she was saying forgot about earth, we are a family now.

" Greetings I am twelve years old. My name is Antoine, but I prefer being called Tony." Tony said and ten sat right back down. He didn't mention anything specific about himself just that his name was Antoine but he preferred to be called Tony.

" Well Since almost everyone has gone and introduced themselves it would be rude of me not to introduce myself. My name is Melody I am also twelve years old. Guess there's only two more people to introduce themselves now that everyone else has gotten it out of the way." Melody said as she sat back down. She was however right you and one other person had yet to introduce themselves. You could wait for the last one to introduce yourself or you could introduce yourself now. It did not take long for you to decide after all you yourself were.....
1233.title: Gather Everyone Together

12332.content:
......A thirteen year old girl. You were the oldest of all the colonist being Thirteen and there was only one other person who was older than you. Fortunately with everyone else introduced you decided to introduce yourself before the last of the boys would. " Hi My name is Kayla and I am thirteen years old, I have red hair and blue eyes. as for my height I am about four feet and nine inches tall." You tell the group your name. With your introduction out of the way the final boy got up and began to introduce himself.

" Hello, Call me Zack, as you can suspect like Kayla I am also thirteen years old. I am about five feet and nine inches tall. So I am at least one foot taller than Kayla. Now that should be all the introductions. SO what will we do now?" Zack asked.

Zack had a point with the introductions out of the way. You knew the colonist would be able to do what we came here to do in the first place. Which meant exploring this purple planet and all of it's wonders. " I am glad I got to know Max, Mary, Peter, Kiki, Hans, Betty, Antoine or Tony which he prefers, Melody and Zack. All nine of my fellow Colonist. First I think we should check our supplies out and see what the transport left us. It may have already left but it should have left some food for us all. " You tell the Colonist. Partially because after that introduction you were hungry and wanting a good meal, however the transport took off rather quick and there is quite the potential that it may have forgotten to leave stuff behind. As you go and check the landing spot for the transport you quickly discovered....
12332.title: A Thirteen Year Old girl

choices: Forage and watch the Young one's
Tell Zack the group he would be in
123321.content:
You quickly discovered that all of the food that was suppose to be sent for you. So that you can live on the planet wasn't even left on the planet! The forgot one of the most basic things that you would need to survive on this planet. This meant that there would be much more difficulties for you ahead. As you all just arrived on the planet on knew very little about it.

" What do we do now we don't have any food?" You asked the rest of the group. You were worried but fortunately some of the others had a few ideas.

" Don't worry Kayla, we may be the same age, but I do have an idea, will just have to hunt for our food. Kind of like the did back in the old days of Earth." Zack said. You really didn't like the idea of hurting animals but you also knew everyone had to eat.

" Yeah! like fishing, but how are we suppose to catch anything?" Hans asked.

" You don't have to worry about that. I am sure we have equipment for that. Our planet may have forgotten our food, but they haven't forgotten our equipment." Melody replied.

" Guess we have no choice, but what if we don't like to hunt we can forage for food." Betty suggested. We all now at least have had some sort of plan to acquire food. Fortunately if we had the equipment to hunt, that means we have the equipment to cook it as well. Which saves us time. However for the food search we would have to be splitting up. One group for the hunt and another foraging. Even though none of us were adults we were still highly capable.

" So I guess this means five of us will go hunting and five of us will go foraging then?" You asked.

" That seems the case, in that case how about Max, Mary, Peter and Kiki will go foraging and the older kids will go hunting. Hunting may be too dangerous for the younger ones right now, especially since we don't know what's there." Zack said taking charge. You admittedly thought his decision was a good one as it kept the younger colonist safe. However You didn't want anything to happen to them and now had to choose would you hunt with the Older Kids, or watch the younger ones as they forage in the forest. You thought of your options and when it came for you to decide you chose to...
123321.title: A Big Problem!

choices: Spot a Native of this Planet
1233211.content:
Forage and watch over Mary, Max, Kiki and Peter. These four were the youngest of the colonists but despite that you were sure that they weren't just sent here cause they were young. After all seeing them looking to find edible food seems like a more reasonable thing to do at this moment. Especially since you hardly knew anything of the creatures on this planet to begin with.

"Zack, I will go with the young ones and find us some food. I believe I will be most useful there." you tell Zack.

" If you say so, Come on group let's go fishing." Zack said. From his words you could easily tell that he didn't have a plan to bring you along on his fishing trip with the others anyways.

The five of you went and looked into the forest, However being a planet of purple it was quite different from what you used to see on earth. That even included the sky, which always had an orange tint to it during the day.

" Stop!" Mary yelled.

" What is it Mary?" you asked.

" I apologize for yelling but you were about to step on that plant, and I don't think that would be a good idea." Mary replied back. You were curious about what Mary had thought of and how she could assume that plant could be dangerous despite only being here only for a day. As you look at the plant however you began to realize that this plant didn't have purple leaves like many of the others. In fact it oddly enough had green leaves on it.

" Mary, you told me to stop because the leaves on this particular plant were green correct?" you asked. Mary simply nodded.

" That's right it was an unusual color for this planet, and even though there are several other plants here with purple leaves, we should be careful because for all we know any plant we touch could be potentially poisonous." Mary replied.

" That's Mary for you, her degree in Biology certainly can be helpful." Max said.

" Mary has a degree in Biology? But she's only ten years old? How did she get a degree in Biology?" You asked.

" By being really smart. I am well aware that most of us aren't even considered adults on earth, despite that all of us have greater talents. Like Max who's good at inventing all sorts of gadgets." Mary replied.

" You two have been quiet? Do either of you have any talents I should know about that could be useful?" You asked Peter and Kiki the other two besides yourself that were in your group.

" Well since you asked, I am quite capable when it comes to learning a different language." Peter said. At first it thought all of you just being young seemed like an incident but you began to ponder that perhaps it wasn't.

" I haven't exactly figured out what kind of talent I have yet." Kiki said.

" That's okay I'm sure you will find it soon enough. As for myself well I do have experience in leading, and I can cook and sew. Other than that I don't think I have all that much to offer." You told the group after they answered your questions about the talents they have. Now that you know a bit about your group who went into the forest to find food you begin to ponder about what will happen next?
1233211.title: The Young and Intelligent

choices: You are awakened by a Startling noise!
12332113.content:
While the five of you were out foraging in the forest searching for food. Zack's group was having it's own problem's as well. The first of which was trying to decide how they are going to hunt and what they are going to hunt and other members of his group weren't exactly keen on leaving some of the younger ones. Especially Hans who was Kiki's friend since childhood.

" Zack, we should be with the others, not doing various jobs separately. I am worried about Kiki, she could be in danger for all I know." Hans said.

"Don't worry she will be fine, Kayla will be watching over them so nothing bad will happen. Besides do you think that this is a normal group of people under thirteen?" Zack asked Hans.

" What do you mean by that?" Hans returned Zack's question with another question. However it wasn't Zack who answered the question but rather Betty.

" What he means is that each one of us has a unique talent, two have leadership skills to keep the Colonist together, Another two are child prodigies. As for the rest I really haven't figured that out but I am sure they have their own unique abilities as well." Betty replied.

" It is as she said, however she forgot to mention that two are linguistic experts despite their age. Myself included." Tony said. Hans was beginning to realize what each member offered but had yet to learn of anything.

" For now let's focus on our task at hand, Hunting but first we will need to get what supplies we can. Luckily while Earth left us without food they didn't leave us without supplies." Melody said.

" Right, but what is it we are going to hunt and how they didn't give us any guns?" Hans asked.

" First we will try fishing at first, We don't know enough about the animals on the land to hunt them yet, but maybe we can do a bit of spear fishing and hopefully we will catch something." Zack said. The rest of group nodded that for now spear fishing would be their best bet. However Hans still had something on his mind as his group began to head towards what they believed was the closest river.

" Something on your mind Hans?" Melody asked.

" I just think that perhaps Earth, left us with no food on purpose." Hans replied.

" Why would they do that?" Melody asked.

" Maybe they just wanted to see that we can survive, I don't know it isn't like we can just take a look back on them." Hans said.

" Maybe or maybe not, but I know Max is a genius and I am confident that he can built something that can help us find out." Melody told Hans reassuringly. Zack's group then began to continue their fishing unfortunately for them, their success was somewhat limited as only one member of the group had managed to catch anything.

Noticing it was getting late Zack told the group to head back to the landing spot. As that would be where they would be sleeping for the night. Fortunately You and you're group were much more successful at finding food then they were at catching dinner.

" All ten of us are back in this spot again." You said as you were preparing a fire with a cauldron and a pot. You were at the moment the only one who was able to cook and the ingredients weren't exactly something you were used to. Fortunately however you had gotten back earlier and found some ingredients and food enough to make a stew out of.

" We didn't have much catching fish, we decided to hold off hunting the other animals until we learn more about them. However we did catch one." Zack said.

" It's a good thing we split into groups otherwise we might have come back with nothing." You told him. As the sun went down the horizon you began to notice the large orange sky began to change color as it went from orange to more of a dark blue. It wasn't like the blue you would see in the sky on earth, but with this dark blue sky you could see the stars from it. You then begin preparations for the fish after it was tested by Max, and Mary to determine it was safe. Fortunately the fish was safe to eat and all the group began to eat the first dish completely made of food from this planet. Which was mainly fish stew, it wasn't an exciting dish but one that was simple enough to make.

Everyone ate the food you made despite not liking some of the ingredients. It was not time for you all to rest. Thankfully the camp is divided as all the girls will be sharing one of the high tech tents, it gives each person their own room and bathroom thankfully. It would be the same with the tent on the guys side as well. Then the final tent that was set up was the kitchen tent, this wasn't set up earlier so you couldn't exactly of made anything but fish stew at the time. For now it was time for you to get some sleep as you were worn out from all the traveling and all of you went to sleep.
12332113.title: The Problems with Hunting

choices: A Carnivorous Beast who just noticed you!
123321132.content:
It has been a week since you arrived you began to get up and get dressed and get ready for this weeks goals. Which were basically find more food and make sure it's edible. Zack would be watching over the youngest of your group this week. Especially since they had success in foraging. Although it was kind of annoying side effect that the majority of foods your group have ate so far had made all your tongue's turn blue.

You went outside and greeted the rest of the colonists who were already packed and ready to go. " Zack don't lose sight of the young one's and try to listen if they have something to say." You told Zack.

" Alright, Mom will do." Zack said jokingly.

" I am not a mother. Just trying to survive." You quickly replied.

" Relax it's a joke, but you have been taking up a rather motherly role since we got here." Zack said.

You were a bit annoyed at his last comment so you decided to just ignore it for now and just get what needs to be done. Shortly after that you left with Hans, Betty, Tony and Peter to go hunting or fishing. Either way it would be your first time working with them, especially since the previous week you've been foraging with the little ones.

As your group venture's further out you begin to see something similar yet a bit different. It is....
123321132.title: A Week Later

12333.content:
The last remaining girl stood up and introduced herself. "I'm Lilly, and I am twelve years old. I hope we can work together to build something." She was wearing a simple yellow sundress and sandals.

Everyone looked to you, waiting for you to introduce yourself, so you stood up and decided to get it over with. "Hi." You absentmindedly smoothed out the front of your pants as you prepared to introduce yourself. "My name is James, and I'm eleven years old, and I was left here by everyone I knew."

"Why didn't you say your name in age order?" Melody asked.

You shrugged, feeling extremely small beneath her glare. "I was nervous." You took a deep breath to calm yourself. "But everyone knows each other now, and we need to get started on building our new home!"

Everyone agreed and began to divvy up the labor, the ten year olds would forage berries, the eleven year olds would gather wood for fire, and the twelve year olds would begin building shelter and starting the fire. Tony thankfully had a lighter in his pocket, and they were able to get a steady fire going, but everyone would have to pitch in to survive, you realized after the sixth trip for firewood.

"Alright everyone!" Melody called out, being the one selected to be the leader, since Tony didn't seem to want to do anything with the group decisions, "Gather around the fire, we need to make sure we have everyone before we go to sleep!" As she counted off everyone, she realized that....
12333.title: Waiting for the last introduction

choices: You Defeated the Bear By yourself! But got a scar in the process
The Bear Gives Up after seeing a Group of Peopl
123331.content:
Someone was missing. However before she could find out who was missing she would need to find out who was here first. She began from the oldest. and had noticed that both Lily and Tony were here so thankfully no one from her age group was missing. Then she went and looked around for the next age group. Which was your group and you were all present. It was when Melody looked at the youngest group that she noticed in particular. Max, Mary and Peter were missing. Yet the only one to return from foraging in the forest was Kiki.

" I see we have three people missing here. Can you explain why you return alone Kiki?" Melody asked her.

" I can, but they wont like it." Kiki replied and began to tell Melody what happened. " we were foraging berries like you said we would me and Mary were pretty happy about it. Peter and Max on the other hand thought it was a girls job and they shouldn't have to do it. They were even upset that a girl was the leader of our group. Then they decided to try and make their own camp in a cave. Unfortunately Mary didn't want to go in the cave because she saw signs and traces of a predatory beast living in there. Then they told us we were just cowards, that was when Mary decided to tell me to return to camp. She made it sound like she was sticking with Max and Peter, but I am not sure if that's the case. "

Melody had received quite a bit of information of Kiki. Enough to know that three of the people she was looking after are in great danger. Fortunately she was quick in deciding a resolution. " Alright Kiki, thank you for your information. I need you to lead us to the others and find a way to get to that cave immediately. Listen up none of us are having dinner until everyone is accounted for, so we are going to follow Kiki and find the three missing members of our crew. Then I am going to have a stern chat with each of them. Be sure and ready a weapon before heading out, we don't know what were facing after all.

" Melody, there is one more thing Mary told me, she was quite fascinated with the forest due to the problems she was having with her electronic equipment in there. It was almost as if the forest had a current of it's own. She once told me." Kiki said. Melody nodded and understood what that meant and then we all grabbed various weapons in hopes of saving the youngest from themselves. As you all began to reach the forest with a weapon in hand you had yet to speak so far, as Melody was the leader and from what you saw of her, she was doing a great job so far. Fortunately their trail was easy to follow and we managed to reach the cave, all seven of you, armed with what people would call primitive weapons.


Mary fortunately left a rather easy trail for your group to follow. With some kind of berry that had appeared to glow in the dark forest. You were impressed by Melody's leadership but it was obvious from her fact that she was slightly irritated by Max and Peter's actions. Once you arrive at the cave, the three came running back towards you screaming. Apparently they had angered the creature within the cave. Unfortunately animals can be highly territorial and you could tell that this was definitely one of those type of animals. You just had to hope the fight goes well. As you saw it emerge from it's cave it looked like a bear, yet at the same time not any type of bear you would ever see upon earth.


" Help us!" Max, Mary and Peter screamed running as fast as they could.


" That's exactly why were here, to help each other. You three should remember that when we get to camp." You said. You looked ot Melody and ready your weapons. You weren't going to let anyone die!
123331.title: Someone was missing!

choices: A loud roar comes from outside
124.content:
Actually....you really didn't find anything specific but you did come to a general consensus that something felt off. Just looking at these people gave off some kind of odd feeling. Obviously it wasn't intentional but the matter still stood in your mind. Either way, these people were climbing aboard the same ship you were so it seemed you were going to get to know them. As you stepped over the airlock threshold, the door closed with all ten of you inside.

Please get into your seats in the next 20 seconds as we begin to depart.

Grumbles and groans escape the people around you as you all are strapped in against the walls. After the 20 second mark, you feel the force of the shuttle as it rocketed away from the station. Within even shorter time, the force caused by movement began to stutter away. Looking out of the window, you could see the lush, purple plantlife on the planet. The locks and straps soon retracted and the door in the shuttle opened.

Welcome to your new home, mind the gravity change as you step beyond the ship. You will find supplies such as wood,
tools, and a limited supply of food in the storage compartment of the ship. Thank you for choosing to partake in this habitation mission.

You shrug as you begin walking to the door, half curious of this new world and half wanting to get away from these strange people all staring at you. However, you take no more than five steps before.....
124.title: Something about them felt unusual.

choices: Find an excuse to talk to the girl dressed like a Ninja?!
1241.content:
Some guy come sup form behind you and eagerly punches you out on to the ground and into the fresh dirt of this planet. Which you are unfortunate enough to get a taste of the dirt. You try to get up but the man that punches you is still standing on you making it difficult for you to move. He then raises some kind of flag and then puts in the dirt.

" I claim this area to be my new Kingdom!" He loudly shouts. It was after that you looked up at him and gave him a bit of your own thoughts.

" Seriously? That's the first thing you do here, we need to survive first before we can do anything else. Also Get off my back!" I told him. He then looked down upon you and finally removed his leg upon your back. You were finally able to get back up. At first you wanted to punch him for that punch he threw earlier at you. However for now better or worse you knew you had to get along with these people.

" I do not recognize you as one of my consorts, so that means you must be a peasant! Worry not peasant I shall protect you from all dangers of this world, and then you realize the greatness of your King!" The man who punched you said. You were annoyed at his calling you a peasant as well, from what you could tell it would be hard for you to get along with this person in particular.

" I am not a peasant! I have a name and so do you. Don't you?" You asked.

" Why, Yes indeed I do peasant!." He said continuing to ignore me plea to not be called a peasant. " For I am King Anthony of this land. I shall make sure my kingdom is a beautiful and prosperous one, so do let me know of any of your complaints and I shall try to amend him." After that little speech you decided to get as far away from him as possible just to resist the urge to punch him. He was aggravating, self-assertive and constantly belittling you. As you walk further away from him you ran into two more people. One was a woman who was dressed normally and another a young man both of them had seemed to be arguing about something. Curiously you check it out to see if you could help, you soon come to regret that decision.

" You woman! How dare you bring such wicked objects to a place worthy of my great science!" the man yelled. The woman had her own argument however.

" These objects will help me attune to the magical energies of this planet, or at least I hope they will. I will not be powerless while I am here with one of your kind, it was because of us working together that we were able to get this far in the first place!" It was then that you decided to interrupt and begin to ask a question.

"Science and Magic, What exactly are you two arguing about?" you asked interrupting there argument.

" You're the guy that got punched by the person who declared himself King of this place. Allow me to introduce myself my name is Clover. This may be hard for you to believe but I am what many would call a witch." Clover said as she introduced herself. You looked to her in slight disbelief and thought of her to be just some crazy woman but apparently she could easily tell from your look that you disbelieved her statement.

" I would prove it to you, but I am not yet in tone with the magical energies this planet has." Clover said. it was shortly after the guy came and introduced himself to you.

" More like you just don't want to embarrass yourself I Edward, a man of science believe that you're just useless here! My Monstrous Advanced Dynamic Science, will amaze you when the time comes! However that is not what you came here for, you came to try to settle our debate correct?" Edward asked.

" Yes, I think an outside opinion might help and it would be good if we could at least try to get along." You explained to both of them.

" Very well, I put it in the most simplest way possible I believe we should head for a way that maintains the planet instead of destroying it. Magic will help with that." Clover said summarizing her statement so you could understand it.

" I disagree with that! Magic is not the answer my M.A.D. Science will be of better use then any of her skills. At least with the Science you will be able to understand it! So who do you think is right?" Edward asks you. After hearing these two people you carefully thought out your decision and decided too.
1241.title: The King, The Witch and The Scientist.

12413.content:
" Sorry but this isn't my argument. Maybe you two should work together and find out what you can do together rather than continuous argue with each other." I told them, after all I really didn't want to talk with them any more. But I was also slightly more distracted by the who was dressed in a blue ninja outfit.

" Besides, I should go look and check on everyone, make sure they're okay and find out about them. So You two deal with your argument, As for me I got a ninja girl to meet." I said and ran off before Edward or Clover could say anything to get my opinion of a matter I really had no idea about.

" Hello, how are you doing?" I asked the Ninja girl.

" Efficient." She said.

" Can you tell me your name?" I asked her. She then gave me a smile and then quickly responded.

"No, If I give you my name, then I would have to kill you."

As for her response it made me realize, that once again I was hit with a sense of abnormality. So far the Ninja girl refused to give me her name and I thought I would get a decent response out of her. Instead I got just even more weirdness. Fortunately she didn't keep me long and At least now I knew four of the people even if only three had given me their names. With that out of the way I decided to go meet another one of the colonist. I narrowed it down to three choices, the man that was sniffing the tree and growling at everyone who went near it. Perhaps he thought he was some kind of werewolf or something. Then there was another girl who as I look, seemed like she was trying to bend a spoon. Or perhaps I should just got look for someone who looks a bit normal? If i Could find someone that is. Eventually I had got my thoughts together and decided to go to...
12413.title: This isn't my Argument..

choices: Search for people native to this planet.
FInd a place to set up camp.
13.content: Not wanting to deal with a greater gravity or anything like that planet similar to earth and even called second Earth was just the planet you would want to visit. Choosing this planet and getting accepted wasn't an easy task however. This planet would no likely be the easiest of all the five that were chosen to inhabit. You couldn't even wait and hoped that you did find alien or native life form's. After all it was the most likely according to report the drones that traveled to the planet gave. You and the colonist relax and within a year arrive upon your destination. It wasn't long after you arrived on Second Earth that you began to...
13.title: Second Earth

choices: Three girls, Two boys you are a Girl
Three boys, Two girls you are a boy.
Two boys, Two girls, and One genderless You never had a gender?!
131.content:
After what seemed like an eternity on the spaceship you had finally arrived on the planet that many people would call Second Earth. At least ten of you did, the other's took to the other worlds and began colonizing their. As the ten of you got out of the ship you were amazed to see how similar this plant was to home. Blue skies, a nice bright sun and several trees and fauna that looked all too similar. Of course you couldn't begin to explore, but others didn't want to at the moment instead they just wanted to rest. You however were eager to explore and wanted to find a few people who were feeling the same. It is a new world you will be living on after all. Just in case though some of the food supplies you have that were stored on the spaceship were left behind, just in case you needed it.


You go and take a deep breath of fresh air and for some reason from what you could tell just by breathing the air on this planet it is much more fresh, than that of your planet's. Of course you quickly realized this was probably due to the industries earth had built up years ago, that had damaged the environment. Still it was a very refreshing breath. You look around and go to a girl who looks to be about sixteen years of age and began to speak to her.

"Hello, Who are you again? You asked. She looks at you at first and then laughs just before speaking again.

" My name is Sarah, you look like you have a big question on your mind. So hurry up and speak it." Sarah said.

" Well I'm just so eager to explore, but I don't want to do it alone, so I was wondering if you would like to come?" You asked.

" You do know it would be a lot easier for you to explore if you wait for camp to be set up right? I know the camp is only temporary but it at least gives us some shelter. " Sarah said.

" I know, but I just rather be out there now." You told her.

" That is why the quicker you help set up camp the quicker we all can be out there." Sarah told you sternly suggesting you should set up camp first before trying to ask anyone to explore. She then continued to speak. " When you finished that you'll have your team of five people who will go out there and explore with you."

" What are you the boss of this expedition?" You asked.

" As a matter fact I am." Sarah said.

" But I am older than you and you are only sixteen years old." You pointed out to her.

" True, but I was the one appointed to lead you guys back home, if you don't believe take a look at this." Sarah went out and pulled a document out of her pocket. You looked at the document and read about every inch of it that you could. Only to learn that indeed Sarah was the leader of the team and was responsible for you all. However despite her age she took her responsibility very seriously and while she had indeed told you to set up camp first she didn't exactly deny you an exploration team either. Which meant that she wanted camp set before anything. With no other options you began to set up camp along with the others, Sarah does indeed help out with the set up and with everyone getting the campsite set up. It wasn't too long before everything was set up.

You were sure now that it would be time for you and your group to set out and explore, however Sarah came and brought to you three people.

" I will be going with you to explore and these are the other three that will be going with us. There names are Naomi, Richard, and Frederick. Each one of them has a unique talent that will help us as we explore the planet. The other five will remain here and make sure nothing happens to the camp while we are away. With that out of the way let's begin our exploration!" With camp set up and a team consisting of Sarah, Frederick, Richard and Naomi you were now ready to explore the planet. Including yourself that makes your team a team of...
131.title: Time to Explore!

132.content:
You immediately began looking around for any clues that would relate to you what would be known as alien life forms. However to Second Earth they would be the natives and you would be the alien, a fat that you were still getting used to. You look around the planet as you exited the transport and saw several creatures that were similar to that of Earth, yet they were also somewhat uniquely different.

Each plant, tree, animal and herb or fruit that grew on this planet would tell you various things about the natives of this world. You didn't want to interrupt the other colonist so you continued looking and observing everything Second Earth had to offer. Many of the colonist that arrived you had their own agenda as well.

" You know we can help you do what you are doing right?" A man asked.

" I know, but I prefer doing this myself, besides we don't know anything about the natives of this planet, especially whether they would be hostile or friendly towards us." You replied.

" Sure, but you really should come with us, we are the only people who will be at this planet for a long while, and there should not be any harm in hanging out with the rest of the Colonists." The man told you insisting that you go and get to know the rest of the colonist. From his persistence you could tell that he wasn't the type to exactly just give up. Even when things would get tough. You reluctantly decide to get to know your fellow Colonist. Despite being much more into running into intelligent life on the planet than interacting with others.

" Hello there, I saw you ran off as soon as the transport left, you must have really been eager to study the life on this planet. It is fascinating after all. You can call me Bridget." Bridget said to you as you entered where the other colonist were.

" What do you know about it? I am sure you are just interested on having a good time, rather than boring old study." You said inconsiderately.

Bridget then puffed out and got a little red after that comment. " Don't just assume things on your own! I happen to be quite the Biologist!" Bridget told you after being offended by your words. It was not long after that you....
132.title: The Seach for Life

134.content:
Upon arriving on the planet you decided right away to get to know the other colonists. After all the ten of you would be living on the same planet and it was important that you got along with each and every one of them. You begin to walk over towards one of the colonists until another one begins to shout!

" Alright, everyone listen up! We are going to be each other's company for quite awhile. So I believe we should all get to know a bit about each other first. So listen up my name is Amy Fisher, I am twenty five years old I am about five foot and nine inches tall. I have blue eyes and blond hair. I think I will leave it up at that for now. So if anyone else want's to introduce themselves go ahead.

It wasn't long after that another person came up. This person was male and looked quite buff and strong. From what you could tell he looked to be a little bit younger than that of Amy. " Hello, fellow Colonists I..I..am Gus Thorn. I am about twenty two years and a bit, well kind of shy...I am five feet and six inches tall and I..I have brown hair and green eyes, can I get off this stage now?" Gus asked looking at Amy nervously.

Shortly after Gus exited another person came up to the temporary stage set up by Amy. " Hi, I like hope you all have a good ay on this vacation of mine, but don't you dare to think you are even more important than me! That is because I am the most important person here. You can call me Carol. I am about five feet two inches, and like have a reddish brown hair and hazel eyes. That should do it for me, I hope you were paid well for this vacation spot."

Each of the three Colonist that have introduced themselves to be varying in personality and behavior. Some for the better and others for the worst. Carol didn't' seem to want to reveal her last name. However the remaining colonist could tell that she had quite a bit to learn. Especially since she has yet to realized this was a one way trip. The next person who would introduce there self to the people who you were going to be living with for quite a while was...
134.title: Talk with the other Colonist.

choices: You start to tinker in your cabin until your called to the main cabin
1341.content:
You got up to introduce yourself.

Hello I'm known as Brando to most of my friends and family back home, my last name is Bain. I have dark brown hair I'm about 5'6 and I normally wear glasses or goggles depending on the situation. I come from ancient America and further back my family lived in what's now the ruins of Scotland. I generally wear the standard shirt and pants but every now and then I'll wear a special kilt I designed. I joined this colonization program because of my technical skills and will be the main tecnicain meaning if you need something fix just find me.

You then sit back down and watch as other members introduced yourself once the meetings over you head to your cabin and wait for the transport to land.
1341.title: You Introduce Yourself!

choices: No machinery worked on the Planet
You were kidnapped by a Native on the planet
13413.content:
After you Amy Fisher, Gus Thorn, and Carol had introduced yourselves none of the others were eager to do so. Instead they were waiting for the flight to be over. Carol had still yet to realize that this was a permanent trip, but you knew she would eventually realize it. You took a small gander in her room once and notice it was filled with many expensive and valuable stuff.

From the look of her room you could tell she was form a wealthy family. While the planet itself did say they would send supplies every six months. You also were accepting of a hard truth. War was about to erupt on the earth once more, however it didn't appear that there would be a winner this time. Especially since you had a friend who tried to warn the people still on earth that a huge meteor was heading towards Earth. They just laughed and dismissed it, they were sure that no matter what would happen they would survive it, just like all the other times they had been warned of impending doom.

The transport begin to land and you can feel the touch of the ground it was hard to believe that it only took you a year to land.
