Before the landing you took a picture of the planet that many on Earth were calling the second Earth. It was a beautiful planet with green grass and trees were plentiful. The oxygen was quite pure and you couldn't smell any of that polluted air that was on your home. For the first time in a long time you knew what your ancestors were talking about when they said the words "Fresh air".

The picture you took gave you a simple design of how the layout of the continents looked. Many of them looked similar but had some slight alterations to them. The rest of the group was also amazed at how fresh the air was. As you suspected as soon as you were off the transport Amy began to take charge and leading the rest of the Colonists.

" Listen up, this planet is where we are going to spend the rest of our lives, so we only have each other to depend on. After all this is a one way trip and there isn't any way we are going back. We are here to stay." Amy told the colonists.

Most of the colonist understood, well everyone except Carol but she would get it eventually. You began to set up what Amy called a temporary base and store what supplies you had left. Much to your surprise none of the machinery used in the area had very minimum pollution. You were happy about this as it meant that for the most part all your fellow Colonist cared about this planet, and didn't want to ruin it with pollution.

It wasn't long after the camp was set up that you were called by Amy.. " Brando, I need your help with something. Can you come here for a bit?" She asked.

" Sure, what do you need help with?" I replied.

" I need you to help fix some machines back here, these machines are mostly used to detect native or alien's on the planet." She said.

" I can do that, but here we are the aliens and if there are others on the planet they are the natives we are the aliens." You told her. You begin to work on the machines and fix them as these machines would help you study and learn about this planet's creature's and inhabitants. However you weren't expecting what came next....
13413.title: Arrival at Destination

134132.content:
The first day on second earth was rather peaceful. Not much was happening as the planets name described Second Earth was very much like that of earth. Naturally however you weren't expecting what came next during that night as you slept in your tent. However your sleep was short lived as you begin hearing strange noises coming from outside. You didn't exactly understand them, but it sounded like a language you have never heard before. You get up and take a look outside your tent only to be knocked unconscious immediately.

It was then the Native's on this planet grabbed you and took you somewhere but you didn't know where. Nor did you know what happened to any of the other colonists. The next time you awoke you were in what appeared to be a cage and surrounded by the natives of this planet. It was the first time you got a look at any of them, but as you looked you can see that there skin was similar to yours but a lot tanner. Perhaps it was because of the exposure to the sun they had. You looked around and saw that none of the other colonist were captured and the only one they caught unfortunately was you. One of the girls had approached you and said something to you.

Unfortunately you could not understand what she had said to you. As you looked from your cage you began to watch and listen to the locals of the planet hoping you could understand each other. Unfortunately it would take time for you to learn there language instead you decided to try and ask them in your tongue to see if they could understand you.

"Hello, why did you lock me up?" You asked.

At first it didn't seem that they understood, but eventually one of the woman had came over and began drawing pictures on the ground. You tried your best to interpret each picture. The first is they saw the Metal from the sky bring you here. That had to be the transport landing. Then the picture shows you setting up your base near the ocean which was true as you all wanted to explore the planet as thoroughly as possible. However the next picture showed that some kind of monster frequently attack that area and the base would have been gone. The other colonist apparently had already left the area while you were still asleep. As the girl drew the next drawing it was showing that of your being kidnapped and dragged towards where you are today. From what you understood the natives had saved you from death, but still haven't explained why they had locked you up. The girl drew another picture this time, it was kind of odd but eventually you were able to make it out. Apparently saving the life of another on the planet to the natives is the equivalent to....
134132.title: Kidnapped!

choices: On the same page as you
Having fun in this planets Ocean.
Arguing about who should be in charge
14.content:
You decided to choose the planet that was the most appealing to you and your desires. You didn't want to be cold and you didn't want to do any type of training to prepare you for the planet. At least not anymore than was necessary. Due to those reason's you chose the fourth planet a planet the wouldn't have as much continent's and very easy weather to be in all year round. You weren't much for the exploration of a planet either. You just wanted to be some place that had none of the rules of earth. Many of which you felt that were a burden. That is the reason you chose this planet because this planet you felt that hear you could make the rules. Of course there were some rules that were understandable to you. Still you'd rather set your own, than follow others.

As for the other colonist that had traveled with you towards this planet they seemed to be...
14.title: A Perfect Paradise?

143.content:
The other Colonists seemed to be setting up the camp that all of us would be staying in. While they were doing that you were sitting down and take a relaxing nap. It has been a long trip to get here after all and you didn't feel like you needed to waste energy helping others due what they were perfectly fine with doing on their own. Unfortunately not all people felt that way.

" Get up!" A woman yelled at you causing you to fall down.

" What do you need me for I am pretty sure that you don't need me to help set up camp." You said.

" I wont have you being lazy! Everyone will do their part! Whether they like it or not!" the woman told you.

" I can't work when I don't the name of whom I am working with. " you told her hoping that would cause her to leave you alone.

" If that's the case then you call me Sakura. Now get to work! This planet may be small but there's a lot of work to be done here." Sakura told you. Learning the name of the woman who was ordering was interesting enough for you to get up and do some basic stuff and set up the campsite. While it was true there were only three continents on this planet and they were relatively close to each other. It was also true that the continents themselves were only explored by drones so far and no one else has actually visit the planet in depth. Despite your not wanting to go anywhere and just relax, Sakura who somehow managed to take charge sets you on....
143.title: The Campsite Fuss

choices: Not a Scientist, but still a Rival?
A Neighbor  you wished you could get away from.
People who didn't believe in the Power of Science!(How dare they!)
15.content: You decided to choose the smallest and lightest of the gravity for the planet's. Not for your own reasons, but because you were a person dedicated to Science and this planet and its fluctuating weather were fascinating to you. You wanted to know what was the cause of these various changes between the various islands. Especially since it all seemed unusual to you. There had to be an explanation for the various weather conditions on this planet. Even if your home planet never heard of such research you had to research it and find what would affect the weather on this planet. It wasn't long after the one year trip in space that you had decided too examine and study all aspects of this planet you were confident with your Scientific abilities that you would be able to find and discover the mysterious weather plans of this planet. Unfortunately for you however you noticed one of the colonists that landed on this planet with you however was....
15.title: A person of Science!

choices: He had a Crush on you
She had a crush on you
You two were on the same team!
151.content:
Your scientific rival whom you always seemed to be on the verge of similar discoveries. Whenever there was a moment of glory either by you or your rival. It always seemed that they had something similar to discuss. Now even upon a planet millions of miles away from your own. You learn that your rival has also appeared upon the same planet as you have. To make matters worst however you are now both stuck on this most interesting planet.

" What are you doing here? Shouldn't you be on some other planet?" You ask suspiciously as you examined your rival carefully. What you didn't know about your rival was that....
151.title: A Rival Appears!

info.brief_description: You are one of the first to inhabit a planet other than earth.  Fifty people were chosen.
info.description:
Colonist Planet Information


The year on your home planet Earth is 5042. Three thousand years ago a plan had begun to allow people to inhabit other planets. This was mostly because Earth's population had become so overpopulated that even getting oxygen would become a problem. Fortunately the plan had succeeded and introduced the first Space Colonies, which significantly reduced the Earth's population. Unfortunately this would once again become a problem in the future, so the people of that time dedicated there lives towards finding other planet's people could live on. After all even though the space colonies had succeeded in reducing the population. The resources to build such Space Colonies would eventually dwindle.

It took humanity two thousand years for them to find suitable planet's to live on. After planets were found it took another thousand years for them to be available to travel to the new planets within a one years time. Now with the technology to quickly travel to the planet as well as the technology to adjust to the gravity of each and various planet. Fifty people were chosen to be the first to inhabit. The people chosen were varied however there were five planet's for them to choose from each with a different and unique environment. It was quickly decided that there would be ten people on each planet. Which will you choose?

Rules


First off welcome to this version of another story called Colonist planet. I gave a bit of backstory on this one. Unlike the first Colonist Planet story this story will focus on you and the other nine colonist with you as you try and survive. The other change is that there are five other planets to choose from. As well as reduced number of colonists this is so it makes it easier to make interactions between you and the other characters. So now let's get to the rules.

1. Colonists are allowed to die and so are you.
2. Ending story however is not allowed until all fifty colonist are dead.
3. Try at least a paragraph for your additions.
4. Have as much fun as you can with this set up.
5. Natives to the planet you chosen are allowed.
6. Natives however can not be based off any anime, comics, manga, or cartoon races. So no aliens from Ben 10, Star wars, Star trek, or any other show you know that has aliens.
7. Natives however can be mythological or covered in fur, with a animal like appearance.
8. No underage sexual interactions, and any type of activity of this sort, the person must have a good relationship with their partner.
Optional Rule: Just so you know if you decide to make your own character a witch or something similar to it, you are allowed to. However keep in mind this is an entirely different planet and there spells may not work out as they would think they would.

That's it for the rules, and remember this story is for fun, so try and have as much fun with this idea as you can. ((Since this interactive is new for a limited time, I will be offering 250gp's per every good addition. I want to make this more popular than my most popular interactive Mirror of Reality. Because of this, I will be notified on site each time someone make an addition to this interactive.))
